about_the_game:
Knights of the purge night

Hunters, as the strongest side of the fight, equip sharp heavy axes on the game map. In addition to being superior in close attack, they also have ranged throwing axes and can participate in the hunt from afar.

Hunters' caged monster truck

The engine of this old 4x4 real-time physically simulated vehicle, specially offered to hunters, needs to cool down at short intervals as it heats up over time. The most powerful side of the vehicle is not just a controllable spotlight that reveals survivors, it also has a cage system behind it that keep the survivors and allows them to be transported with the vehicle.

Survivors' escape plan

The survivors must repair their damaged vehicles to get out of town alive. If they manage to restore their damaged vehicle to working order in any way, they can now use it and destroy the exit gate by hitting it with their vehicle to escape.

KEY FEATURES

  • Be the hunted or the hunter:
    There are two different gameplay types you can choose in the game. While the hunters represent strength, the survivors are legends of perseverance. Survivors must take advantage of the darkness to move stealthly and collect equipment to defend themselves. If you protect your teammate, he will protect you. Hunters must hunt down survivors with their specialized equipment and heavy close-range weapons. The hunters' partnership continues until all survivors have been hunted.
  • Survivors' equipments:
    Survivors can stun the hunters by setting bear traps on the road or at the house entrance where they walk. Survivors can be searched for pistols, pistol bullets and a special rare shotgun on the game map. They can protect their teammates by finding a shotgun. Survivors can carry tires, batteries, and gasoline to repair their vehicles, but this slows them down. If you are being chased by a hunter, you may need to drop the heavy items you are holding. When the survivors are caught by the hunters and thrown into the cage, using lockpicks can allow them to escape on their own.
  • Key of the escape:
    As survivors, the only way to defeat the hunters is to repair your car and leave the town. You must fight against all the dangers that will happen to you during this period and You must be strong. Your mission list will tell you what you need to do, without needing a map. Survivors who act with team spirit have a very high chance of winning the game.
  • Hiding areas:
    Survivors, can hide in houses, closets, bushes, trunk of vehicles and many other places on the game map.



  • Customized voice chat:
    Hunters and survivors can communicate by speaking when they are in close proximity to each other, just like in real life. Players' voices will be more spooky with special effects when playing as a hunter. Basic voice chat allows players from both teams to communicate seamlessly with their teammates from one end of the game map to the other. allows them to establish players can also opt for distance-sensitive 3D voice communication feature. You can adjust your voice chat settings before starting the game.
  • Real-time physics-based vehicle use:
    Both survivors and hunters will have pleasant moments with realistic vehicle dynamics. Regarding the vehicles of both teams there are advantageous and disadvantageous situations they will experience, and this situation clearly reveals the difference in superiority of the teams over each other.
  • Hunters' equipments:
    Hunters can collect throwing axes on the game map, and they can also replace the heavy ax they have with another heavy ax around they like. The pendant flashlight reveals survivors for a short time and can only be used to illuminate the surroundings while it is on cooldown.
  • Stamina management of hunters:
    Hunters owe some of their special abilities to their rage-filled stamina power, but using abilities depletes stamina and is expected to refill over time. It will be beneficial to make your moves strategically.
  • Heat in the hunter vehicle:
    Hunters' monster truck needs to wait for a short time and cooldown after moving fast for a long time. If the survivors manage to repair their vehicles, It eliminates the problem of hunters overheating their vehicle by using its full power. Hunters now have no choice but to win.
  • Instantaneous high speed:
    Hunters can dash forward a short distance to avoid bullets or close the distance between them and survivors, but this consumes stamina as a result.
  • Return as a raccoon:
    Survivors can continue the game even when they are executed by the hunters. The player, who returns to the game as a cute raccoon, can continue playing with his teammates, but it can no longer interact with anything.
  • Electricity of the town:
    Cutting off the electricity of the town is simple for the hunters, they can go to the electricy transformer and block the electricity of the town in one blow to make it difficult for the survivors to escape from the town. In this case, the survivors must act carefully and try to escape quickly from the town.
  • Town's exit gate and barricades:
    The town has two active exit gates, but both of them are closed by hunters. It is not possible for the survivors to overcome these gates with their own means. However, if they can repair their vehicles, they can close the barricades by restoring electricity to the town and manage to escape by breaking the gate with their vehicle. Also there are more than one escape hatch on the game map, survivors can mislead hunters about their whereabouts.
  • Solidarity between survivors:
    When any of the survivors are seriously injured by the hunters, they fall to the ground and start crawling. If the survivor's friends help him up off the ground, the fallen survivor gets up again and continues the game. Each survivor has two lives, survivor who fall a second time can now be executed by the hunters. If a survivor fall down for the first time and If the survivor's friends do not help, the hunter catches survivor and puts in a cage. The survivor imprisoned in the cage can be free by using the lockpick or by his friends outside of the cage.

short_description: Night of the Slayers is a 5v2 first-person survival co-op horror game in which hunters can collaborate as effectively as the survivors. Escape with your friends without becoming prey, or scour the town with your pickup and hunt the survivors.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese
